abstract: The recall affects 271,000 pickups in model years 2013-14 equipped with 3.5-liter V-6 engines.
snippet: The recall affects 271,000 pickups in model years 2013-14 equipped with 3.5-liter V-6 engines.
lead_paragraph: Ford is recalling about 271,000 2013-14 F-150 pickups with 3.5-liter V-6 engines because the brakes may malfunction, the automaker said on Wednesday. The company said it was aware of nine accidents but no injuries.

headline.main: Ford Recalls Some F-150 Pickups for Potential Brake Problem
